# General Info
This script contains all the models tested in our manuscript (https://osf.io/preprints/psyarxiv/wvfnb). It requires JAGS and dwiener. The script is structured s follows:

1. **Preparation:** loading libraries and load workspace
2. **Multi-attribute DDM:** Function, Estimate maDDM, Test Parameters and some graphs (corresponds to DDM)

# 2 multiattribute DDM 
## 2.1 Estimate maDDM_2w with hierarchical Bayesian modeling 
```{r}
# get data and initial values together and specify the model
ddmData <- list('N'=N,'S'=S,'P'=P,'H'=H,'tasteA'=tasteA,'tasteB'=tasteB,'healthA'=healthA,'healthB'=healthB,'RT'=RT)

#starting values
nChains <- 8

T1<-Sys.time()
ddmJAGS <- jags.parallel(ddmData,inits = NULL,
                    parameters.to.save = c('mu_bound','sigma_bound','mu_ndt','sigma_ndt',
                                           'mu_drift','sigma_drift','mu_weight1','sigma_weight1',
                                           'mu_bound_H','sigma_bound_H','mu_ndt_H','sigma_ndt_H',
                                           'mu_drift_H','sigma_drift_H','mu_weight1_H','sigma_weight1_H',
                                           'bound','ndt','drift','weight1',
                                           'bound_H','ndt_H','drift_H','weight1_H'),
                    model.file = "BayesModel_maDDM.txt", working.directory = 'BayesModels',
                    n.chains = nChains, n.iter = 60000, n.burnin = 30000,n.thin = 12, DIC = TRUE,jags.module = c("glm","dic","wiener"))
T2<-Sys.time() #T2-T1

# check convergence and fit
ddmRhats <- ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$summary[,8] #check with max(Rhats), which should ideally be < 1.01 (1.05 would also be okay)
max(ddmRhats)
ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$DIC

save.image(file="workspace_DDM.RData")
```
## 2.2 maDDM_2w: check parameters (group posteriors)
```{r}
#get group parameter estimates in transformed form 
boundSep_S <- log(1+exp(ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_bound))
boundSep_H <- log(1+exp(ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_bound+ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_bound_H))
boundSep_delta <- ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_bound_H

ndt_S <- log(1+exp(ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_ndt))
ndt_H <- log(1+exp(ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_ndt+ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_ndt_H))
ndt_delta <- ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_ndt_H

weight1_S <- pnorm(ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_weight1)
weight1_H <- pnorm(ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_weight1+ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_weight1_H)
weight1_delta <- ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_weight1_H

drift_S <- log(1+exp(ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_drift))
drift_H <- log(1+exp(ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_drift+ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_drift_H))
drift_delta <- ddmJAGS$BUGSoutput$sims.list$mu_drift_H
```
